+#pragma once

+#include <memory>
+
+#include "torch/csrc/utils/hash.h"
+
+namespace torch {
+namespace autograd {
+
+class Function;
+
+/// Represents a particular input of a function.
+struct Edge {
+  explicit Edge(
+      const std::shared_ptr<Function>& function_ = nullptr,
+      uint32_t input_nr_ = 0)
body: Hmm we can't make `grad_accumulator()` return a (non-const) reference, because Variable only keeps a weakref to its grad accumulator (otherwise you end up with a reference cycle), so it needs to obtain a strong one every time you call `grad_accumulator()`. Yea, let's leave it
